ROOT.ds0: --树控件 select devicestrid as deviceid,D.devicedesc as devicename,c_nameshort as typename,deptdesc as stationname,voltagedesc as voltagename from tdevice{{0}} d --JOIN DEVICEPARAM.DBDEVICE B ON d.DEVICENAME=B.DEVICENAME left join tdepartment{{0}} t on d.ownerdepartidx=departidx left join tvoltage{{0}} v on t.voltageidx=v.voltageidx left join ttype p on d.typeidx=p.typeidx where voltagedesc is not null and deptdesc is not null and (p.typeidx=1 or p.typeidx=38) and voltagevalue > 150 AND t.ISOWNSDJK=1 AND voltagedesc!='1000kV' ORDER BY v.voltagevalue desc, typename desc,deptdesc , D.devicedesc
ROOT.dsSta: --显示厂站 SELECT DISTINCT VOLTAGENAME||STATIONNAME AS STA FROM( select devicestrid as deviceid,D.devicedesc as devicename,c_nameshort as typename,deptdesc as stationname,voltagedesc as voltagename from tdevice_TJ d --JOIN DEVICEPARAM.DBDEVICE B ON d.DEVICENAME=B.DEVICENAME left join tdepartment_TJ t on d.ownerdepartidx=departidx left join tvoltage_TJ v on t.voltageidx=v.voltageidx left join ttype p on d.typeidx=p.typeidx where voltagedesc is not null and deptdesc is not null and (p.typeidx=1 or p.typeidx=38) and voltagevalue > 150 AND t.ISOWNSDJK=1 AND voltagedesc!='1000kV' AND voltagedesc={0} {{1}}) ORDER BY STA
ROOT.dsDev: --显示设备 SELECT DISTINCT VOLTAGENAME1||DEVICENAME AS DEV FROM( select devicestrid as deviceid,D.devicedesc as devicename,c_nameshort as typename,deptdesc as stationname,v.voltagedesc as voltagename,v1.voltagedesc as voltagename1 from tdevice_TJ d --JOIN DEVICEPARAM.DBDEVICE B ON d.DEVICENAME=B.DEVICENAME left join tdepartment_TJ t on d.ownerdepartidx=departidx left join tvoltage_TJ v on t.voltageidx=v.voltageidx left join tvoltage_TJ v1 on d.voltageidx=v1.voltageidx left join ttype p on d.typeidx=p.typeidx where v.voltagedesc is not null and deptdesc is not null and (p.typeidx={0}) and v.voltagevalue > 150 AND t.ISOWNSDJK=1 AND v.voltagedesc!='1000kV') WHERE STATIONNAME={1} ORDER BY TO_NUMBER(SUBSTR(DEV,0,INSTR(DEV,'k')-1))
ROOT.dsSel_Dev: --显示某个设备 SELECT DISTINCT VOLTAGENAME1||DEVICENAME AS DEV,deviceid FROM( select devicestrid as deviceid,D.devicedesc as devicename,c_nameshort as typename,deptdesc as stationname,v.voltagedesc as voltagename,v1.voltagedesc as voltagename1 from tdevice_TJ d --JOIN DEVICEPARAM.DBDEVICE B ON d.DEVICENAME=B.DEVICENAME left join tdepartment_TJ t on d.ownerdepartidx=departidx left join tvoltage_TJ v on t.voltageidx=v.voltageidx left join tvoltage_TJ v1 on d.voltageidx=v1.voltageidx left join ttype p on d.typeidx=p.typeidx where v.voltagedesc is not null and deptdesc is not null and (p.typeidx={0}) and v.voltagevalue > 150 AND t.ISOWNSDJK=1 AND v.voltagedesc!='1000kV') WHERE STATIONNAME={1} {{2}} ORDER BY TO_NUMBER(SUBSTR(DEV,0,INSTR(DEV,'k')-1))
ROOT.ds1: --显示设备 SELECT DISTINCT VOLTAGENAME||STATIONNAME AS STATIONNAME FROM( select devicestrid as deviceid,D.devicedesc as devicename,c_nameshort as typename,deptdesc as stationname,v.voltagedesc as voltagename,v1.voltagedesc as voltagename1 from tdevice_TJ d --JOIN DEVICEPARAM.DBDEVICE B ON d.DEVICENAME=B.DEVICENAME left join tdepartment_TJ t on d.ownerdepartidx=departidx left join tvoltage_TJ v on t.voltageidx=v.voltageidx left join tvoltage_TJ v1 on d.voltageidx=v1.voltageidx left join ttype p on d.typeidx=p.typeidx where v.voltagedesc is not null and deptdesc is not null and (p.typeidx=1 or p.typeidx=38) and v.voltagevalue > 150 AND t.ISOWNSDJK=1 AND v.voltagedesc!='1000kV') WHERE deviceid={0}
